title.narrative: Aawaz Voice and Accountability Programme - Implementation Phase through Supplier

description.narrative: This activity (Aawaz Voice and Accountability Programme - Implementation Phase through Supplier) is a component of AAWAZ - Voice and Accountability Programme Pakistan reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £37,329,959. This component benefits Pakistan, and works in the following sector(s): Democratic participation and civil society, Media and free flow of information, Human rights, Women's equality organisations and institutions. , with the following implementing partners: AECOM, DAI Europe. The start date is 21-05-2012 and the end date is 20-05-2018.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Media and free flow of information

Other General Services - General Public Service - Other General Services - support to civil society
Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - Social Affairs - Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - social services (incl youth development and women+ children)
Aggregated spend of less than £500 - Financial Year 2012 Quarter 1
